column5: Being bored I googled turning laptop into a fishfinder or some such phrase and found this awesome little outfit.  Fishfinder for pc  Now I can really pimp out the Sportspal
May as well buy a real outdoor fish finder cuz the transducer cost $892. You can get allot of fishing stuff for that.
My laptop is not water, or weather proof.
I had my laptop hooked up to my gps for a few years so I could have coloured mapping before mapping became available on most GPS....a real pain in the ...... but it did work
Now if they made an app for those smartphones that everybody seems to be getting these days, that might be an idea.  Or I could build a cabin midships on the sportspal
I really like my Lowrance LMS 520C unit and the new HDS units are even better....anyone getting rid of their HDS units cheap to go to a laptop on your boat please call me first..
